originalText.text: I've used several different heating service companies over the years for recurring problems with the boiler/heating system in my home in Manhattan. The last time, a friend suggested that I call Plumbing NYC. I now have an annual service agreement with them, and have not had any problems with my boiler since. They are friendly, courteous, and come every fall to service my home's heating system before winter hits. I recently also had a plumbing problem, and they were there within an hour to fix it--at my preferred customer rate.
